items.name: Building Websites for Beginners
items.description: A creative commons book aiming to provide an gentle introduction to building websites for complete beginners.

items.name: Better Web Alliance
items.description: A voluntary collective of websites and web developers aiming to make the world wide web a better place by putting users first.

items.name: ccolour-juicer
items.description: A simple cli utility to print out a list of unique colours in a given css file.

items.name: blitz-path
items.description: Rust implementations of the A* and JPS pathfinding algorithms. Useful for games.
